plot: I am because I am accidental: a girl in the midst of falling, a fallible girl, that is my grandeur.
title: A Fallible Girl
plot_es: I am because I am accidental: a girl in the midst of falling, a fallible girl, that is my grandeur.
plot_en: I am because I am accidental: a girl in the midst of falling, a fallible girl, that is my grandeur.
